mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SALES_PLAN WHERE ( CASE #{dateSearchCondition} WHEN 'salesPlanDate' THEN TO_DATE(SALES_PLAN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHEN 'dueDateOfSales' THEN TO_DATE(DUE_DATE_OF_SALES, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END ) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SALES_PLAN WHERE TO_DATE(SALES_PLAN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{salesPlanDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT * FROM SALES_PLAN WHERE MPS_APPLY_STATUS IS NULL AND ( CASE #{searchCondition} WHEN 'salesPlanDate' THEN TO_DATE(SALES_PLAN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHEN 'dueDateOfSales' THEN TO_DATE(DUE_DATE_OF_SALES, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END ) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: Insert into SALES_PLAN ( SALES_PLAN_NO, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, SALES_PLAN_DATE, UNIT_OF_SALES, DUE_DATE_OF_SALES, SALES_AMOUNT, UNIT_PRICE_OF_SALES, SUM_PRICE_OF_SALES, MPS_APPLY_STATUS, DESCRIPTION) values ( #{salesPlanNo:VARCHAR} , #{itemCode:VARCHAR} , #{itemName:NVARCHAR} , #{salesPlanDate:VARCHAR} , #{unitOfSales:VARCHAR} , #{dueDateOfSales:VARCHAR} , #{salesAmount:INTEGER} , #{unitPriceOfSales:INTEGER} , #{sumPriceOfSales:INTEGER} , #{mpsApplyStatus:CHAR} , #{description:NVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SALES_PLAN SET ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode:VARCHAR} , ITEM_NAME = #{itemName:NVARCHAR} , SALES_PLAN_DATE = #{salesPlanDate:VARCHAR} , UNIT_OF_SALES = #{unitOfSales:VARCHAR} , DUE_DATE_OF_SALES = #{dueDateOfSales:VARCHAR} , SALES_AMOUNT = #{salesAmount:INTEGER} , UNIT_PRICE_OF_SALES = #{unitPriceOfSales:INTEGER} , SUM_PRICE_OF_SALES = #{sumPriceOfSales:INTEGER} , MPS_APPLY_STATUS = #{mpsApplyStatus:CHAR} , DESCRIPTION = #{description:NVARCHAR} WHERE SALES_PLAN_NO = #{salesPlanNo}
